translations.source: 焦炉是炼焦的核心设备。
translations.target: The coke oven is the core piece of equipment in the coking process.

translations.source: 装煤车负责向焦炉装入配合煤。
translations.target: The coal charging car is responsible for charging the blended coal into the coke oven.

translations.source: 推焦车将成熟的焦炭从焦炉中推出。
translations.target: The coke pusher pushes the finished coke out of the coke oven.

translations.source: 熄焦车将红热焦炭运送到熄焦塔。
translations.target: The coke quenching car transports the red-hot coke to the quenching tower.

translations.source: 湿法熄焦用水冷却红热焦炭。
translations.target: Wet quenching cools red-hot coke with water.
